title: Andrés Iniesta
summary: Andrés Iniesta Luján (Spanish pronunciation: [anˈdɾes iˈnjesta luˈxan]; born 11 May 1984) is a Spanish professional footballer who plays as a midfielder and is the captain of J1 League club Vissel Kobe. Considered one of the greatest midfielders of all time,[2][3][4] Iniesta spent most of his career at Barcelona, where he served as the captain for three seasons.
